# The `NumericalStabilitySanitizer` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Instantiating <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-numericalstabilitysanitizer-cpp-/numericalstabilitysanitizer">NumericalStabilitySanitizer</a> inserts the nsan runtime library API function declarations into the module if they don&#39;t exist already. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class anonymous_namespace{NumericalStabilitySanitizer.cpp}::NumericalStabilitySanitizer</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Instantiating <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-numericalstabilitysanitizer-cpp-/numericalstabilitysanitizer">NumericalStabilitySanitizer</a> inserts the nsan runtime library API function declarations into the module if they don&#39;t exist already.

Instantiating ensures the &#95;&#95;nsan&#95;init function is in the list of global constructors for the module.

Definition at line 550 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/instrumentation/numericalstabilitysanitizer-cpp">NumericalStabilitySanitizer.cpp</a>.
